Control Name: Establishes Relevant Technology Acquisition, Development, and Maintenance Process Control Activities—Management selects and develops control activities over the acquisition, development, and maintenance of technology and its infrastructure to achieve management’s objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Establishes Relevant Technology Acquisition, Development, and Maintenance Process Control Activities—Management selects and develops control activities over the acquisition, development, and maintenance of technology and its infrastructure to achieve management’s objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC5.2 COSO Principle 11: The entity also selects and develops general control activities over technology to support the achievement of objectives.
